name: Snowicide Prevention (Harry Stott, sambamuel)
description:
CONTROLS:

Left Mouse Button: Shoot

A: Move Left
D: Move Right
W: Climb Ladder

AT OPEN WINDOWS:

R: Reload

S: Close Window

INSTRUCTIONS:

Stop the snowman from melting itself in the open windows,

you can heal the snow man using the snowball gun when it's health gets low!

Close all the windows in time before it meets it's demise in this mountain mansion...

CREDITS:

Programmed By Sambamuel

Music by Joel Smith and Tommy Wright

Animation by Aaron Cornfield

Slimey Hatch Logo by Jess Childs

Designed By Harry Stott

Slimey Hatch is created and managed by Sambamuel
